'''''Adventure Time''''' is an animated television series that aired on ''[[Cartoon Network]]'' from 2010-2018, telling the story of {{Wikipedia|Jake the Dog}} and {{Wikipedia|Finn the Human}} in the Land of Ooo.

== About ==
'''''{{Wikipedia|Adventure Time}}''''' is an action-adventure comedy series, known for its distinctive "noodley" art style and nonchalant sense of humor. The show is set in the post-apocalyptic [https://adventuretime.fandom.com/wiki/Land_of_Ooo Land of Ooo], a continent where anything could happen. The heroes are a young boy named Finn and his friend, a shapeshifting dog named Jake, as they go on various weird adventures. Across their journeys, they regularly come into conflict with the {{Wikipedia|Ice King}}, a fiendish villain who kidnaps princesses, most commonly the scientist {{Wikipedia|Princess Bubblegum}}. Other characters include Princess Bubblegum's pet [https://adventuretime.fandom.com/wiki/Lady_Rainicorn Lady Rainicorn], Finn and Jake's sentient game console [https://adventuretime.fandom.com/wiki/BMO BMO], [https://adventuretime.fandom.com/wiki/Lumpy_Space_Princess Lumpy Space Princess], and {{Wikipedia|Marceline the Vampire Queen}}.

=== Diamonds and Lemons ===
Revealed at [[MINECON Earth 2017]], Diamonds and Lemons is a non-canon episode of Adventure Time crossing over with ''Minecraft''.
